examples.igbo: ụmụ akwụkwọ niile nọ ebe a

examples.english: All the books are on the table.
Many people came to the party.

examples.igbo: e nwere ọtụtụ kpakpando n'elu igwe

examples.english: Some of the apples are ripe.

examples.english: The other book is on the shelf.

examples.igbo: Ọ nwere atụmatụ ọzọ maka ngwụsị izu.

examples.english: Do you have any other questions?
examples.igbo: Ị nwere ajụjụ ọzọ ọ bụla?

examples.english: He lives in a big house.

examples.igbo: Afọ warara ahụ dị ize ndụ.

examples.english: The room is full of people.

examples.igbo: Mmiri ahụ na-ele anya ruru unyi.

examples.english: The dull tool is hard to use.

examples.english: The wet towel is on the floor.

examples.english: If it rains, we will stay inside.
